attributes.action: abolish the enforcement of pre-pay meters by energy companies.
attributes.additional_details: there are households in the u.k. today who will,WITHOUT DOUBT,fall into arrears with their energy companies due to the massive hike in prices,and,even though the government are giving cash to help these people out,it still not enough to make up the deficit.if energy companies start installing these pre-pay meters in homes they will cause EVEN MORE STRESS TO PEOPLE.ban the enforced pre-pay meters.A.S.A.P.
attributes.background: stop the energy companies forcing entry in to homes to install pre-pay meters as that should be against the law.
